abstract: Oracle Chief Executive Larry Ellison said he would not sell off the hardware business of Sun Microsystems, dispelling speculation that he only wanted the company for its software units, Reuters has reported.
lead_paragraph: Oracle Chief Executive Larry Ellison said he would not sell off the hardware business of Sun Microsystems, dispelling speculation that he only wanted the company for its software units, Reuters has reported.

headline.main: Oracle Won’t Divest Sun’s Hardware Business
